headline: Gartner Survey Reveals Personalization Can Triple the Likelihood of Customer Regret at Key Journey Points
summary: DENVER, June 03, 2025--Personalized marketing, while valuable for some, generates negative experiences for 53% of customers, who were 3.2x more likely to regret a purchase and 44% less likely to purchase again in the future, according to a survey by Gartner, Inc.
